title: #107 Candy Pt. 2
itunes:title: #107 Candy Pt. 2
description:
This week, Brian is back and the guys continue their discussion on candy by trying out some new candy while debating how many licks to get to the center of a tootsie pop, whether the M&M characters need a new makeover, and if Pop Rocks and Coca-Cola will cause your stomach to explode.

 

Podcast produced by Nate & Laura Bargatze

Recording & Editing by Genovations Media

https://www.natebargatze.com

https://www.allthingscomedy.com

https://www.genovationsmedia.com

Email - Nateland@NateBargatze.com

 

Solo stove - SoloStove.com

·       Right now, you can get big discounts on all fire pits during Solo Stove’s Summer Sale. 

·       And use promo code NATE at solostove.com for an extra $10 off.

·       That is solostove.com, promo code NATE for $10 off on top of their incredible Summer Sale discounts.
